Once you have the key, you will need to speak to the Regirock, Regice, and Regice trainers in the Unova region. They will give you a special item that will allow you to access the Regi Pokémon's Abilities section of the Pokédex.

From there, you can use the Regi Pokémon's Abilities section of the Pokédex to find the Regi Pokémon. You can also use the Regi Pokémon's Abilities section of the Pokédex to learn more about the Regi Pokémon's abilities and how to use them.

It's important to note that the Regi Pokémon are rare and difficult to find, so you may need to use a combination of the Regi Pokémon's Abilities section of the Pokédex and the Regirock, Regice, and Regice trainers in the Unova region to find the Regi Pokémon.
